tatami.core.agent

Class AgentComponent

  • java.lang.Object
    • tatami.core.agent.AgentComponent
  • All Implemented Interfaces:
    java.io.Serializable
    Direct Known Subclasses:
    ClaimComponent, CognitiveComponent, ContextComponent, HierarchicalComponent, JadeComponent, MessagingComponent, MonitoringTestComponent, MovementComponent, ParametricComponent, PingTestComponent, VisualizableComponent, WebserviceComponent

    public abstract class AgentComponent
extends java.lang.Object
implements java.io.Serializable
    This class serves as base for agent component. a component is characterized by its functionality, denominated by means of its name -- an instance of AgentComponent.AgentComponentName.

    A component can belong to at most one CompositeAgent, which is its parent. When created, the component does no have a parent; a parent will be set afterwards.

    The class also offers direct access to a basic set of components. It is not recommended for components to retain the reference, as it may become null if the component is removed. // TODO: implement mechanisms to enable caching of component references, invalidating the cache only at specific agent events; add the event COMPONENT_CHANGE.

    The class serves as a relay to access some package-accessible functionality from CompositeAgent.

    Author:
    Andrei Olaru
    See Also:
